name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remix for Chrome - CSA Recipe Saver

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to save recipes and their ingredients from the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your favorite recipes from across the web. The Remix extension makes it easy to save recipes to your Remix account, where you can later search through them by ingredient.  

Whether you are trying to use up produce in your fridge or find creative new ways to cook with your CSA box ingredients, Remix lets you plan your meals around ingredients, enabling you to cook both locally and seasonally while also reducing food waste. Get ideas for recipes from other members of your CSA and save trips to the grocery store with Remix's meal planner. 

To start, simply click the blue Remix rice bowl in your address bar and hit save. It's as easy as that.
